nodes.text: Tozz Relaton was a male Human political commentator for the Imperial News Network. In 44 ABY, Relaton and his partner, Salia Deradal, covered the report on the destruction of Natasi Daala's–a candidate for the Imperial election–campaign headquarters on the planet Hagamoor 3, and how it would affect incumbent Head of State Jagged Fel's chances of winning the election.
